body.description: Participant details, including member or team identifier and workspace role.

memberId.description: Organization member numeric identifier to add as a workspace participant. Provide either `memberId` or `teamId`.

teamId.description: Team numeric identifier to add as a workspace participant. Provide either `memberId` or `teamId`.

userNameOrEmail.description: Username or email address of the user to add as a workspace participant. Alternative to providing `memberId`.
